scripts.build:proto: rm -rf generated/* && mkdir -p generated && grpc_tools_node_protoc --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:generated --grpc_out=generated --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=node_modules/.bin/grpc_tools_node_protoc_plugin --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts --ts_out=grpc=true:generated todo.proto
scripts.build: npm run build:proto && npm run build:ts
